title: Partner Applications
subtitle: Review and manage partner applications
noApplicationsDesc: Partner applications will appear here when users register.
noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

search.placeholder: Search applications by name, email, or company...

approval.title: Approve Partner Application
approval.subtitle: Set commission rate and referral code for {{name}}
approval.commissionRateDesc: Select the commission rate for this partner
approval.desiredCodeDesc: Enter a custom referral code or leave blank for auto-generation
approval.summaryText: Partner will receive {{rate}}% per paying user. Referral link will be /signup?ref={{code}}.
approval.successDesc: Partner has been approved successfully with {{rate}}% commission rate.

rejection.title: Reject Partner Application
rejection.subtitle: Provide feedback for {{name}}
rejection.reviewNoteDesc: Explain why this application was rejected (required, 10-1000 characters)
rejection.reviewNotePlaceholder: Please provide specific feedback on why this application was not approved...
rejection.reviewNoteMinLength: Review note must be at least 10 characters
rejection.reviewNoteMaxLength: Review note must be less than 1000 characters
rejection.successDesc: Partner application has been rejected successfully.

details.title: Application Details
details.subtitle: Review application from {{name}}
details.marketingDesc: Communication preferences set by the candidate during registration
details.partnerNewsletterDesc: Monthly newsletter with tips and strategies

messages.applicationApprovedDesc: Partner application has been approved successfully.
messages.applicationRejectedDesc: Partner application has been rejected successfully.
messages.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this application?
messages.confirmRejectDesc: This action cannot be undone. Please provide a review note.
messages.errorLoadingDesc: Failed to load partner applications. Please try again.

errors.approvalFailedDesc: Failed to approve partner application. Please try again.
errors.rejectionFailedDesc: Failed to reject partner application. Please try again.
errors.fetchFailedDesc: Unable to load partner applications. Please refresh the page.
errors.invalidCommissionRateDesc: Commission rate must be between 10% and 90% in 5% increments.
errors.invalidCodeDesc: Referral code must be 3-20 characters long and contain only uppercase letters and numbers.
errors.codeAlreadyExistsDesc: The desired code is already in use. Please choose a different code.
errors.invalidReviewNoteDesc: Review note must be between 10 and 1000 characters long.
